product_name: Mosquito Deleto Mosquito Spray for Yards
description:
Turn your yard into a mosquito-free zone

Our powerful, pet-safe* mosquito killer spray creates a protective barrier that keeps your outdoor spaces mosquito-free for weeks.

Tired of mosquitoes crashing your outdoor plans? Our botanical blend of lemongrass and cedar oils packs a one-two punch: it kills pesky mosquitoes, fleas, and ticks on contact, plus creates an invisible barrier that keeps them away for up to 4 weeks. And since it's powered by plants, you can feel good about using it around your family and pets.

Sunday creates effective pest control solutions that harness the power of plants to protect your outdoor living spaces.

sections.product_features:
Kills and repels mosquitoes on contact
Protection lasts up to 4 weeks
Safe for people and pets when used as directed
Easy 10-minute hose-on application
No synthetic pesticides
Universal hose connector included
sections.ingredients:
Lemongrass Oil (2%): Natural mosquito repellent that creates an invisible barrier
Cedarwood Oil (15%): Botanical pest control that kills mosquitoes, ticks and fleas on contact.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply during active mosquito season when weather is dry.
Attach sprayer to garden hose
Spray target areas thoroughly but don't soak Protected zones: Focus on patios, decks, and gathering areas Perimeter treatment: Create a barrier around your outdoor living space Problem areas: Target dense vegetation, shady spots, and damp areas
Protected zones: Focus on patios, decks, and gathering areas
Perimeter treatment: Create a barrier around your outdoor living space
Problem areas: Target dense vegetation, shady spots, and damp areas
Allow to dry completely before use
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
How long will it keep mosquitoes away from my yard?
Mosquito Deleto provides protection for 2-4 weeks depending on weather conditions. Lasts longer in dry climates, reapply more frequently in rainy areas or after precipitation.
What's the best way to protect my yard from mosquitoes?
Create "mosquito-free zones" in your yard where you spend the most time. For best yard protection, apply Mosquito Deleto twice in the first week, then maintain with regular applications.
Can I use this with other Sunday products?
Yes! Apply either first, just wait 24 hours between applications to ensure maximum effectiveness of all products.
Any state restrictions?
Currently not approved in DC, ID, IN, MD, ME, MS, or MT.
